document_data.name: Emerald Eye
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Emerald Eye''''' was a [[pirate]] ship based out of [[Jahaka Anchorage]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The ''Emerald Eye'' had a [[Merfolk|mermaid]]-shaped figurehead. It also had cabins decorated like the homes of the [[pasha]]s of [[Calimshan]].
document_data.Crew: The ''Emerald Eye'' was captained by the [[Calishite]] pirate [[Zaroum Al-Saryak]]. Its first mate was a [[berserker]] by the name of [[Voltan]]. The crew included fourteen Calishite pirates and five [[Chultan (ethnicity)|Chultan]] warriors.
